publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5720.2 Pauline McNeill: Access to BBC Albaâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5720) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, after "platforms" insert "and therefore calls on the BBC management and Virgin Media to resolve the ongoing dispute regarding carrying BBC channels on the cable network to ensure the widest possible access to BBC Alba".
